alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Johnson; Marion; Morgan; Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 1:15AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Shelby, western Hancock, west central Rush, northeastern Morgan, Johnson and southern Marion Counties through 145 AM EST... At 114 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenwood, or 12 miles south of Indianapolis, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beech Grove around 120 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Greenfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 89 and 112. Interstate 70 between mile markers 79 and 104. Interstate 74 between mile markers 93 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hancock; Johnson; Marion; Morgan; Rush; Shelby
